execution_plan.description: Count members per chat and return chats having member count greater than a given threshold.
execution_plan.query:
SELECT chats.id AS s1__id, chats.name AS s1__name, COUNT(chat_members.user_id) AS s1__member_count
FROM chat_members
INNER JOIN chats ON chats.id = chat_members.chat_id
GROUP BY chats.id, chats.name
HAVING COUNT(chat_members.user_id) > $THRESHOLD;
